channel.title: Stegos on Abu Baker Al-Shammari
channel.description: Recent content in Stegos on Abu Baker Al-Shammari

item.title: Stego
item.description: What is this? Steganography is basically a way to conceal message, file or picture inside a file. The reason why I am writing about this is because many of the challenges you find in CTF are “stego”. For example, you receive a picture, where you either have to look what’s inside the file or go through filters to uncover the hidden text. How do I decode or encode? By doing many CTF’s and failing over and over again, you will come across many tools.
